    class HomeController

    Controller for the home page

    Public Instance Methods

    index() click to toggle source

    This action sets values that are used by the home page

    Story: Display front page(www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/644119#!/stories/36203957)

    @param: search

    @return

    # File app/controllers/home_controller.rb, line 12
def index
  @categories = Category.all
  #Get popular times,
  ## TODO: @popular: Add the logic for sorting based on popularity
  @popular = Item.all.sample(4)
  ## TODO: @featured: Select where featured is true, but now we have nothing, so keeping this random
  @featured = Item.all.sample(4)
  @search = Item.search(params[:search])
  @items = @search.all   # or @search.relation to lazy load in view
end
